text: The Barrio Boyzz were a Puerto Rican boy band. The group was founded in New York City by Joe Jacket (of New Kids on The Block). They were signed to SBK Records in 1991. They also starred in the 1994 movie I Like It Like That. Their duet with American singer Selena called "Donde Quiera Que Estés" peaked at number-one on the Billboard Hot Latin Tracks in 1994., The band disbanded in 2001. == Albums == * Crazy Coolin' (1992) * Donde Quiera Que Estes (1993) * Una Vez Más (1995) * How We Roll (1995) * Navidad, Tu y Yo (1995) * Ven a Mi (1997) * Destiny (2000) * Destino (2001) == References == Category:1990s American music groups Category:1991 establishments in New York (state) Category:2000s American music groups Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:American boy bands Category:American pop music groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:Latin music Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2001 Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical groups from New York City
title: Barrio Boyzz
